item.title: Land Grab: Inside Israel’s Escalating Campaign for Control of the West Bank
item.description: Israeli seizure of Palestinian lands in the West Bank, often brutally, has accelerated, raising doubts about the prospects of a peaceful solution to t...

item.title: U.S. Strikes on Syria Underscore Scale of Challenge for Its President
item.description: The Syrian government did not comment directly on the extensive American strikes targeting the Islamic State on Friday, but said it was intensifying i...

item.title: With Attacks on Oil Tankers, Ukraine Takes Aim at Russia’s War Financing
item.description: Strikes on four vessels signal that Kyiv is willing to expand the maritime theater of the conflict in an effort to crimp Moscow’s military funding.

item.title: Sudanese Refugees Describe Their Escape From Darfur
item.description: No one knows the true toll of the massacre, and the city remains isolated. Now, refugee camps in Chad are flooded with newly displaced Sudanese.

item.title: Taiwan’s Subway Stabber Planned His Deadly Spree, Police Say
item.description: Investigators said they were unsure of the attacker’s motives. But clues pointed to an isolated and increasingly troubled life, and no accomplices.
